backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining products, orders, user profiles, phone verification, and access-controlled APIs with persistent state maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten frontend file summaries covering styling, routing, components, APIs, error handling, and product image logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining custom OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app root and main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/api/adminProductHooks.ts: React Query hooks for admin product CRUD operations with query invalidation and actor-availability checks.
frontend/src/api/authHooks.ts: Hook to check whether the current authenticated caller is an admin using React Query and actor state.
React Query mutations and queries for requesting and verifying phone codes with sanitization and identity checks.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Centralized React Query key definitions for products, orders, admin, user profiles, and phone verification.
frontend/src/api/shopHooks.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching products, creating orders, and initializing the shop using an actor with error sanitization and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/api/userProfileHooks.ts: Defines hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile with authentication checks and query invalidation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React router configuration with layout and routes for storefront, admin, auth, and checkout, wrapped in CartProvider.
frontend/src/components/checkout/OrderSu: Renders a summary of cart items with prices and subtotal for checkout.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Displays an access denied message with navigation back to the home page.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AsyncSt: Handles loading, error, and empty UI states with optional retry and a sanitized error display.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with brand info, links, contact text, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the site header with navigation, cart button, branding, and optional admin link.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product card with images, description, price, stock, and add-to-cart functionality.
Parses and displays product descriptions line by line, supporting key-value formatting.
Displays a responsive grid of product cards or a fallback when no products are available.
Displays a product image gallery with fallback handling and thumbnail navigation, using product ID or name to load images.
Provides a search input and category filter UI for product lists.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Defines the site-wide content configuration interface and documentation for all editable marketing copy.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, handling login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables, dark mode styles, and base utility layers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutContactPage.tsx: Renders About and Contact sections using site content, including marketing text and contact details.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, and publishing products with dialogs and validation. Handles admin auth, product form state, and CRUD actions via hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls and removal options. Shows empty state and provides order subtotal and navigation to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Fetches and displays products for a specific category using a grid layout. Includes loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Collects shipping details and submits orders, clearing the cart on success. Shows order confirmation with reference ID after completion.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero content and featured products with admin-aware empty states. Pulls products and supports shop initialization for admins.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles user login with phone-based OTP verification and profile creation. Manages multi-step form, validation, resend cooldowns, and authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays a product’s details, images, stock, and allows adding the product to the cart with quantity control.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Fetches and filters all products by category and search query, rendering them in a grid with loading and error states.
frontend/src/store/cart.ts: Implements cart state operations including load/save, add, remove, update, clear, and subtotal/item count calculations.
frontend/src/store/CartProvider.tsx: Provides React context for cart state, syncing with storage and exposing cart manipulation helpers and totals.
frontend/src/utils/authFlowErrorSanitize: Converts authentication-related errors into user-friendly messages, removing technical details.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Formats numbers as INR currency using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Maps product IDs to image sets and generates URLs using public asset utilities.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Generates safe public asset URLs that work in local and IC deployments by computing the correct base path.
frontend/src/utils/storefrontErrorSaniti: Normalizes storefront browsing errors, mapping IC and backend errors to clearer user-facing messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, known issues, architectural notes, and implemented features for build planning.
